Duncan Garner: Celebrating seven years clean by going bushhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-listener/opinion/duncan-garner-celebating-seven-years-clean-by-going-bush/O3AAWLIO3RCWXKVMMBL3ANBCVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-listener/opinion/duncan-garner-celebating-seven-years-clean-by-going-bush/O3AAWLIO3RCWXKVMMBL3ANBCVQ/ I didn't miss my phone, it was 2 weeks away from a constant barrage of digital noise. Fri, 05 Apr 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Duncan Garner: "Going offline gave me a lot of down time to think, contemplate and conclude, once again, that we’ve got it wrong. My two-week tap-out confirmed to me that our society is designed around a mad rat race." Photo / Tony Nyberg
